page.title: 10Services in Woolley Moor
page.content: There are{no shops}in Woolley Moor.We found out about the different people who come to the village. The{local milkman}delivers to most houses. The{fishmonger}brings fresh fish every Thursday morning.The{fish {and chip van}comes every Tuesday night. The{butcher}and{baker}come every Monday, Wednesday and Friday. {Groceries}may be ordered on Tuesday and delivered on Fridays. The{mobile library}comes every other Thursday. The{rent man}comes on Fridays. This service saves going into Chesterfield.{Dustbin men}come every Wednesday. The{Postal Service}collects mail twice a day with one delivery. There is a{home help}for pensioners. Five{buses}leave Woolley Moor for Chesterfield each day. Four buses travel the other way. There is no Sunday bus service.
